stylePalette: accent with subtle gold or bronze for premium feel
styleCues: Authentic lifestyle imagery integrating office desks with laptop, notebook, and coffee cup
late morning natural light through office windows
shows a busy professional woman (28-40) focused yet relaxed
close-up of Dynamind IQ packaging on desk edge and 2 chocolate-flavored soft chews prominently displayed beside a smartphone and planner
product packaging fits perfectly in her blazer pocket as she prepares to leave a meeting room
soft warm lighting emphasizing premium chocolate texture of chews
no water bottle in sight, conveying on-the-go ease
FacebookAd.styleNotes: Combines lifestyle integration with pocket-ready convenience messaging. Showcases seamless daily usage for busy professionals managing meetings and multitasking. Focus on tangible premium sensory experience (smooth chocolate flavor, soft chew texture) and portability.

visualStructure.primaryScene: Focused busy professional at office desk managing multiple devices and notes, slight lens blur on background to direct attention to product.
visualStructure.productPlacement: Dynamind IQ packaging front and center on desk, crisply detailed, authentic brand design.
visualStructure.productDetail: Two chocolate-flavored soft chews, showing smooth texture and embossed logo detail on surface, in sharp focus next to packaging.
visualStructure.visualHarmony: Headline anchored near laptop screen; proof text near chews; CTA near pocket with packaging visibly slipping in.
visualStructure.textOverlays: Large, clear in dark gold on soft neutral background areas for maximum contrast.

footer.background: warm bronze strip on soft white background

requiredAlways: Must Always include "Available on Amazon" official Amazon tag
Must Always include "Chews Health" official Logo from the references
Must Always include "Dynamind IQ Product image" from the references
